attributes.background: For example, I took my cat to two different Vets in my area,  I was given exactly the same treatment from both vets.  Vet A charged me approx £30 whilst Vet B charged me £96.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about vets fees, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We aren't sure what kind of regulation you'd like. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259400
